  "description": "PE LIFTS specializes in designing, installing, and maintaining elevators (lifts) for various types of buildings. PE LIFTS offers a range of solutions to meet the needs and preferences of every customer, such as pneumatic Vacuum elevators, platform elevators, etc.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Marketing Director
Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Job&nbsp;Description


	The Director of Marketing is a senior leadership position responsible for developing and executing the overall marketing strategy to drive brand awareness, market share, revenue growth, and customer engagement.
	This individual will lead a dynamic team of marketing professionals and collaborate with other departments to ensure consistent brand messaging and alignment with the company&rsquo;s goals and vision.


Key Responsibilities
Strategic Planning &amp; Leadership:


	Develop and lead the execution of the company&#39;s comprehensive marketing strategy, aligned with business objectives.
	Oversee the development and implementation of annual marketing plans, including campaigns, events, digital marketing, and PR initiatives.
	Conduct regular market analysis to identify new opportunities, customer segments, and competitive threats.
	Set clear KPIs and performance benchmarks for all marketing initiatives.


Team Management:


	Build, lead, and mentor a high-performing marketing team across functions such as digital, content, communications, product marketing, and creative.
	Define roles and responsibilities, and manage team workload, budgets, and performance reviews.
	Foster a culture of innovation, collaboration, and accountability.


Brand Management:


	Ensure consistent brand messaging across all marketing channels and touchpoints.
	Oversee the development of brand guidelines and maintain the integrity of the brand&rsquo;s voice and image.
	Manage corporate identity and ensure adherence across internal and external communications.


Digital Marketing &amp; Analytics:


	Drive performance marketing campaigns across channels (SEO, SEM, social media, email, etc.).
	Leverage data and analytics tools to measure campaign effectiveness and optimize strategy accordingly.
	Stay current with digital trends and emerging platforms to ensure marketing approaches remain cutting-edge.


Product &amp; Customer Marketing:


	Collaborate with product and sales teams to create go-to-market strategies for new offerings.
	Develop and execute product positioning and messaging that resonates with target audiences.
	Lead customer research initiatives to understand needs, behaviours, and satisfaction levels.


Budget &amp; Vendor Management:


	Develop and manage the marketing department budget, ensuring maximum ROI from spend.
	Oversee vendor selection, negotiation, and management for marketing services and tools.
	Track and report on the return on investment (ROI) and effectiveness of marketing initiatives.


Cross-functional Collaboration:


	Work closely with Sales, Product Development, Customer Service, and other departments to ensure marketing efforts support overall company goals.
	Represent marketing in executive meetings, offering insights and data to inform decision-making.


Qualifications &amp; Experience


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or a related field (MBA preferred).
	10+ years of progressive marketing experience, with at least 5 years in a leadership role.
	Proven experience in developing and executing successful marketing strategies.
	Strong leadership and people management skills.
	Deep knowledge of digital marketing channels, tools, and best practices.
	Experience in branding, market research, and data analysis.
	Excellent communication, presentation, and organizational skills.
	Ability to think creatively and strategically.
	Experience managing large budgets and working with external agencies.


Key Competencies:


	Strategic Thinking
	Leadership &amp; Team Development
	Creativity &amp; Innovation
	Analytical Skills
	Results-Orientation
	Communication &amp; Interpersonal Skills
	Adaptability &amp; Agility


Method of Application
